title: Cannot access banking web site
content:
Reply to zeroknight - 2. I use Bitwarden for my password manager. When I disabled it I was able to access Regions. All my other logins seem to be working OK. Maybe a Bitwarden update will fix the problem. Anyway, I know what the problem is now.

Thanks again.
creator: AlbertHall1

title: Cannot access banking website
content:
Reply to zeroknight. Disabling the extensions did the trick. I only have five extensions so I'll just go through them one at a time until I find the culprit.

Thanks very much for your help.
creator: AlbertHall1

title: Google Images Click to See Image Preview/Full Size Image No Longer Works
content:
On version 89 while on Google Images, I can no longer click the image thumbnail to bring up the side menu on the right with the full size image.

It previously worked fine. I tried troubleshoot mode with all extensions removed and same issue. I tried on chrome/edge and later versions of firefox above 100 and it works as well.

My guess is there was some recent change on googles end that broke this on the older version. 89 supports webp so im not sure its that.

I like this version and would like to exhaust all possible fixes before defaulting to updating.
creator: mribschmitty

title: Cannot access banking web site
content:
This is in response to zeroknight. Sorry, I didn't know how to reply directly to your email.

I deleted the site cookies and disabled tracking protection with no success, however, I was able to login in trouble shooting mode. I went back to normal mode but was still unable to login. Is there anything I can do to correct the problem?

Thanks for the reply.
creator: AlbertHall1

title: Recently used list  if right-click the firefox icon pinned to the taskbar.
content: How to remove the recently used list that appears when you right-click the firefox icon pinned to the taskbar in Windows 10?
creator: niebywaly

title: Firefox icon turns into private mode icon. But im not in private mode!
content:
Hello, i need help. If I create shortcut, and start firefox in another profile, like this:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" -class FF2 --profile "C:\Users\mire\Desktop\TEST\Apps\Instagram" --no-remote instagram.com

And if i set in "user.js" --> user_pref("taskbar.grouping.useprofile", true);.

For some reason after firefox starts, or after second start, firefox icon on the taskbar turns into a private browsing icon!

I tried everything to prevent this, I tried to add:

user_pref("browser.privateWindowSeparation.enabled", false); user_pref("browser.privacySegmentation.windowSeparation.enabled", false);

Nothing works...

I checked million times that im not in private browsing, and i'm not.

Then, after some tests I found that if I remove the flag: "user_pref("taskbar.grouping.useprofile", true);" from 'user.js' and 'prefs.js', and start profile again, taskbar icon becomes normal firefox icon.

Is this a bug?

And what should i do if i want to have separate grouping for the PROFILE2, and i don't want to have that private browsing icon?

You can see in the picture what was happening...
creator: mire021

title: Cannot access web site
content:
Since the last Firefox update I cannot access my banking web site. I access this site almost daily. It is Regions Online Banking. It will not accept my username either by copy and paste or by typing it in. By not accepting it I mean the login space remains blank. I disconnected from my VPN, no change. I was able to access the site normally using MS Edge.

I am running Windows 11, 64-bit.

Any help would be appreciated.
creator: AlbertHall1

title: Reddit Notifications
content:
Hi

I get loads of these constantly popping up when i open firefox how can i turn them off
creator: chris34731

title: How to Widen Firefox Vertical-Scroll-Bars on Windows-11 Laptop?
content: On my Windows-11 Laptop, the Vertical-Scroll-Bars in Firefox are too narrow for me to use comfortably. I am struggling with the Touch-Pad, Mouse Pointers, causing the frequently needed act of Scrolling to become a dreaded ordeal? If someone would provide clear and concise instruction on how to make the Vertical-Scroll-Bars the Classic Width of old, it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you! lg
creator: LG3

title: when I work on my second display, Firefox is no longer topped on my first display. Why?
content:
When a firefox window is active on my second display, I lose the firefox menubar on my main display. I haven't noticed this before, is it something new, or have I inadvertently changed a setting?

pete
creator: peterlemer

title: ACESSO SISTEMA GESP DA POLÍCIA FEDERAL
content:
Bom dia,

Preciso acessar o Sistema GESP, da policia federal, é através do site https://servicos.dpf.gov.br/gesp/ utilizando certificado digital, quando selecionado o perfil do certificado e colocada a senha, automaticamente é redirecionado para o site gov.br para com o certificado e senha poder ser redirecionado para o sistema, no entanto não consigo entrar no gov.br. Então acesso com o certificado no primeiro momento, no entanto, logo em seguida não consigo prosseguir, pois não consigo entrar com o certificado digital. Mas se acessar diretamente o site gov.br consigo entrar na minha conta utilizando o certificado digital, através do sistema da policia federal não consigo o acesso, porém, direto na mesma página o acesso é realizado normalmente.

Gostaria de um auxílio para solucionar esse problema, uma vez que tenha prazo para cumprir no sistema da polícia federal.

Obrigado.
creator: lotufovalli.adv

title: Firefox closes all tabs when I click on a new link on mail or address icon on mac
content:
I noticed that a couple of times when I click on an external link on a mail or a bookmarked site as icon on my mac, Firefox closes all the tabs and open that link in a new window, so I lose all the tabs and address... Sometime I have more than 30 tabs open and i't difficult to reopen all from history. What happen? Why? I can't see also the "restore last session" command into History menu. Can be fix it? Thank you.

Federico
creator: info11063

title: Sito web che non carica tutti i contenuti.
content:
Buongiorno, volevo segnalare che già dalla versione 123.0 di Firefox per Windows 10, nella pagina di accesso al proprio profilo del sito web di Eniplenitude (https://eniplenitude.com/my-eni), non si carica il form di inserimento delle proprie credenziali. Il problema permane anche con la versione 124.0.1 di Firefox.

Vi ringrazio anticipatamente. Rosario
creator: alros1927

title: miss-type emaill address, how to remove them?
content: My vision is not good, so I often miss type things. So I enter things like[email@mail.com] instead of {email@gmail.com} and variations there of. So every time I go to a new site, and I gave to enter my email address I get a list of miss-typed addresses with the correct one. Everything I try to search on how to to delete these erroneous entries, comes back on how turn off the option to use this function. I have how to delete old CC information and thing like that. but not miss-typed email address. Thanks in advance. McK
creator: Goodtimebyall

title: Installation 124 wiped out my pinned and opened tabs
content:
This is the 2nd time in the last year or two that the auto-update deleted all my pre-defined tabs, including those that were pinned. All that I had was a single tab.

Why?
creator: gwp99

title: 2FA security
content:
I am an 84-year-old newbie! I have enabled 2 FA. But... when I click on Firefox in the taskbar F/fox opens and I can access all the bookmarks in the bookmark bar without any more security.

When does the 2FA come into this?
creator: chris.arme

title: antivirus non mi protegge quando entro nella banca on-line
content:
Buongiorno, da un pò di giorni non riesco ad entrare con protezione nel sito della banca (antivirus Kaspersky). Ho chiamato la banca pensando che fosse un loro problema, ma mi hanno fatto provare con un'altro browser e con quello la protezione funziona; mi hanno detto che è un problema di Firefox. Vorrei capire come devo fare per ripristinare la protezione , che ha sempre funzionato; grazie.

Cordialmente Mauro
creator: maurogaffurini430

title: Instant crash on startup, including safe mode
content:
CrashID: bp-5b2cb490-913f-4ffa-8f1b-35cba0240323

Hello, since today I am experiencing instant crash on start up. It was perfectly fine yesterday (10 hours ago). Even attempting to open safe mode when offered also instant crash. Firefox is currently unuseable.

I believe the recent 124.0.1 is the issue ? Can this be confirmed, where can I check if this issue is widespread & the ETA to an eventual fix ?
creator: diego.mrnj

title: Warning on Mac but not on iPhone
content:
A friend posted a link in our WhatsApp chat about free flights. I went to access it via my Mac, but FF immediately showed a warning message. However I was able to clink on the link via my iPhone. Why did I not get the same warning message on the phone?

I really wish I had taken a screenshot. Time to learn!
creator: non-tech

title: html5 player directional keys rebind
content: when pressing the left or right arrows keys, the video is skipped like 5s or whatever. iIs there a way to change that amount?

title: Video download helper icon does not appear on Firefox toolbar
content: I am setting up a new mac computer (Mac book Air M3 with Sonoma 14.3). I have installed Video Download Helper. The icon appears in the Applications folder and the Dock, but not in the Firefox toolbar. How can I get the icon back? Many thanks.

title: New PDF Editor
content: How do I perform very basic editor functions like add/remove/move a page in the new Firefox PDF document editor? I am in the Mainstream Firefox 124.0.1 64-bit. Thank You, David

title: Bookmark Smart Shortcut - Not open in new tab
content: Hi, When I use a shortcut for a bookmark (e.g., typing "yt" to activate my youtube search bookmark with URL set to "https://www.youtube . com/results?search_query=%s" and shortcut set to "yt") it opens in a new tab. I am in the habit of making a new tab before using a shortcut to search using a bookmark. How can I change the shortcut bookmark behavior to open in the same tab where i typed the query into the URL bar?
creator: sgbhagwandin

title: Tabs crashing after an unknown period of time
content:
I have a very annoying issue.

I am on the Firefox ESR version which is deployed via Intune. I am on the latest 115.9.0 and on Windows 11 22H2

After a certain period of time (never took note of it sadly) tabs start crashing and keep crashing. The only way to fix this issue is to terminate firefox via task manager and relaunch.

What is the best way to start investigating this and try to understand what is causing the tab crashes.
creator: jaquilina

title: Huge gaps in MathML's "mtable" render output
content:
I don't know if that was supposed to look like, but when rendering MathML in Firefox 124.0.1 when one uses "mtable" element the browser adds very huge gaps around.

The included image shows output for the following code:

<math display="block"> 

 <mfrac>    <mi>A</mi>    <mn>2</mn>  </mfrac>  <mo>=</mo>  <mrow>  <mo> ( </mo>  <mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable>  <mo> ) </mo>

</mrow> </math>
creator: felix.leg
